summary: After getting interested in murder as a kid in Colombia, Gabriela now has a scrapbook on murders including clippings on "The Blue Blood Killer". While cleaning his latest murder scene in Miami, she comes across a clue missed by the cops.
cast: William Baldwin|Angela Jones|Bruce Ramsay|Lois Chiles|Barry Corbin|Mel Gorham|Daisy Fuentes|Carmen López|Vivienne Sendaydiego|Caridad Ravelo|Sandra Thigpen|Kelly Preston|Lupita Ferrer|Sabrina Profitt|Charley Tucker|Allysa Tacher|Nattacha Amador|Therese Marie Gutierrez|Jay Arnor|Nicoll Bacharach|George Clooney|Vincent De Paul|Quentin Tarantino
keywords: bubble gum|psychotronic film|scene of the crime|serial murder|death
title: Tú asesina, que nosotras limpiamos la sangre
